postMessageContactSend.description: initates a message to one or more mobile numbers

parameters.mobileNumbers: required, an array of one or more mobile numbers
parameters.subscribe: optional, a flag to indicate a subscription should be created if none exist
parameters.resubscribe: optional, a flag to indicate a subscription should be reset if currently unsubscribed
parameters.keyword: required when subscribe and/or resubscribe are true, must align with code on message
parameters.override: optional, a flag to indicate that the contact is receive the messageText as provided instead of the message's original text
parameters.messageText: required when override is true, the text value to be used in place of the message's original text
parameters.keywordFilter: optional, a string specifying a Keyword that message recipients must be subscribed to in order to receive the message

parameters.keyword: the keyword that will be used to optin to this message
parameters.responseMessage: the response message used for Single Optin messages
parameters.messageOptinType: the type of Optin used for the message (Single, Double, or Age)
parameters.optinMinimumAge: the minimum age needed to Optin to this message

parameters.allowSingleOptin: when set to true, users will not be able to Optin more than once
parameters.duplicateOptinMessage: the message returned when a user attempts to Optin more than once
parameters.doubleOptinInitialMessage: the first prompt that is returned to a user who has initiated an Optin
parameters.doubleOptinConfirmationMessage: the confirmation message returned when a user completes a Double Optin
parameters.doubleOptinValidResponses: a pipe-delimited list of acceptable responses for a Double Optin
